text: William Todd Bell (17 March 1905 – 1937) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back. He played five times for Sheffield United in the Football League First Division. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Ashington Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Blyth Spartans A.F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: William Bell (footballer, born 1905)
